name: Tzaangors
description: These savage1 beastkin have been warped into shapes more pleasing to Tzeentch. They fight with the speed and violence of unbridled change.

abilities.name: Tzaangor with Two Blades
abilities.description: Roll 4 dice for this Tzaangor's Savage Blade rather than 2.

abilities.name: Tzaangor with Shield
abilities.description: This Tzaangor has a Vigour of 7 rather than 5.

abilities.name: Tzaangor with Greataxe
abilities.description: This Tzaangor's Savage Blade has a Damage of 2 rather than 1.

abilities.name: Bloodhunger
abilities.description: If a Tzaangor inflicts any wound on a hero, it immediately attacks the same hero with its Vicious Beak.

difficultyBonuses.description: In addition to bonus to Vigour, Tzaangors gain +1 Move and +1 Agility.
In addition to bonus to Vigour, Bloodhunger rool now triggers each time Tzaangor inflicts a wound.

table.name: Bloodfeast
table.description: Each Tzaangor moves towards the most wounded hero it can reach, or towards the nearest hero if it can reach any. Then, each Tzaangor attacks with its Savage Blade if it is in range.

table.name: Bestial Charge
table.description: Each Tzaangor moves towards the nearest hero. Then, each Tzaangor attacks with its Savage Blade if it is in range.

table.name: Challenge the Mighty
table.description: Each Tzaangor moves towards the leasy wounded hero it can reach, or towards the nearest hero if it can reach any. Then, each Tzaangor attacks the least wounded hero in range with its Savage Blade.
